title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not indicate that the researchers should set up and monitor the growth rate of an identical culture of wild-type E. coli that lack the mutation.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not indicate that the E. coli-M bacteria will (initially) exhibit exponential growth.
The response indicates that the E. coli-M bacteria will (initially) exhibit exponential growth.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not indicate that the growth medium should initially contain a concentration of nutrients including glucose that far exceeds the requirements of the relatively small inoculum of bacteria.
The response indicates that the growth medium should initially contain a concentration of nutrients including glucose that far exceeds the requirements of the relatively small inoculum of bacteria.
